title: Generate Comparative Market Analysis (CMA)
description: A seller client requests a CMA to determine a listing price for their home. The agent must find comparable properties and generate a report.

tasks.description: Identify the subject property's details (address, beds, baths, sqft).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the key features of the seller's property.

tasks.description: Search the MLS for recently sold, active, and pending comparable properties within a 1-mile radius.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds at least 3 sold, 3 active, and 2 pending comps.

tasks.description: Generate a CMA report summarizing the comps and suggesting a price range.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a formatted CMA report with a logical price recommendation.
